mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The work is reconstruction of the principal interiors from the Glasgow home of the architect Charles Rennie Mackintosh and the artist Margaret Macdonald Mackintosh. The house was purchased by the University of Glasgow in 1946. In 1963 the house was demolished after everything was salvaged from it. The interiors, completed in 1981, have been furnished with the Mackintoshes' own furniture - all to Mackintosh's design - and decorated as closely as possible to the original. -- http://www.hunterian.gla.ac.uk/collections/art_gallery/mac_house/machouse_index.shtml [work]
